title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect: details of messages and gun casings emerge
description: Utah officials say they were contacted by family friend of Tyler Robinson, 22, accused of killing rightwing activist
content:
The initial portrait emerging of the man authorities say killed the conservative activist Charlie Kirk in Utah is a complicated one.

title: AstraZeneca pauses £200m investment in Cambridge research site
description: Decision means none of drugmaker’s much-trumpeted £650m UK investment package is currently proceeding
content:
The drugmaker AstraZeneca has paused a planned £200m expansion of its Cambridge research site, completing a depressing week for the UK pharmaceutical industry.
The decision by the UK’s largest company means none of its much-trumpeted £650m investment... [3620 chars]

title: Assisted dying bill is a ‘licence to kill’, Theresa May says
description: Former prime minister makes comments as Lords debate legislation for England and Wales for first time
content:
The bill to legalise assisted dying is a “licence to kill” that puts vulnerable people at risk, Theresa May has said, as the legislation was debated in the House of Lords for the first time.
The former prime minister said she opposed the bill because... [3279 chars]

title: England vs South Africa LIVE: Second T20, Old Trafford
description: England face South Africa in the second T20 at Old Trafford - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
content:

title: Taylor Swift to Be Deposed in ‘It Ends With Us’ Fallout
description: Lawyers for Justin Baldoni said that Taylor Swift "agreed" to sit for a deposition, though Blake Lively's legal team is skeptical.
content:
Taylor Swift will be deposed in the sprawling legal battle over alleged sexual harassment and public relations maneuvering involving the filming It Ends With Us, according to court documents filed by Justin Baldoni‘s lawyers.
